mapper.select: SELECT b.mnfdSeq ,a.mnMmName ,a.mnMmIntroduce ,b.mnMmSeq ,b.mnfdFriendSeq FROM matnamFriend b LEFT JOIN matnamMember a ON b.mnMmSeq = a.mnMmSeq OR b.mnfdFriendSeq = a.mnMmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND NOT a.mnMmName = #{mnMmName} AND b.mnMmSeq = #{sessSeq} AND b.mnfdFriendStateCd = 4 OR b.mnfdFriendSeq = #{sessSeq} AND NOT a.mnMmName = #{mnMmName} AND b.mnfdFriendStateCd = 4
SELECT count(*) FROM matnamChattingroom WHERE 1=1 And (mnMmSeq = #{mnMmSeq} And mnfdFriendSeq = #{mnfdFriendSeq}) OR (mnfdFriendSeq = #{mnMmSeq} And mnMmSeq = #{mnfdFriendSeq})

SELECT a.mnChat_Num , a.mnMmSeq , a.mnfdFriendSeq , c.uuidName , c.path FROM matnamChattingroom a LEFT JOIN matnam.matnamUploaded c on c.typeCd = 145 and defaultNy = 1 and a.mnMmSeq = c.pseq WHERE 1=1 and a.mnMmSeq = #{mnMmSeq} and a.mnfdFriendSeq = #{mnfdFriendSeq} and c.pseq = #{mnMmSeq}
